entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning and late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
